short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Become a more conscious social media poster!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Type Above Hate will make sure your posts and comments on social media are socially acceptable and non-offensive. Adding Type Above Hate means that your posts on Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, and Instagram will be analyzed for discriminatory terms and will notify you that your message may be harmful or not get across properly.

The database used in Type Above Hate has been provided by HateBase, the world's largest online repository of structured, multilingual, usage-based hate speech.
